Posts.Content: I am really replying with a question. Does her insurance pay for Avastin. I have a friend who is in the same situation as your mom. She's only 39 and her insurance won't pay for the drug because it is for colon ca and not approved by the FDA for breast ca. But it has passed all the clinical trials and is definitely proven effective.
Posts.Title: Avastin and Abraxane info please?
